rindex 0.1.0

    • Compatability with mlfilms package

Interpolated Refractive Function

Source: R/rindex.function.R
rindex.function.Rd

Interpolated Refractive Function

rindex.function(pageid)

Arguments

pageid

The material pageid from rindex.search

Value

A function that will return the complex refractive index(s), given the wavelength(s) in meters

Examples

rindex.search("Ag")
#>      pageid                           DIVIDER                         BOOK
#> 3         1                       Ag - Silver                           Ag
#> 4         2                       Ag - Silver                           Ag

Ag_data <- rindex.get(0)
#> Warning: cannot open file 'C:/Users/Tom/Desktop/rindex/inst/extdata/refractiveindex.info-database-master/database/data': Permission denied
#> Error in file(file, "rt", encoding = fileEncoding): cannot open the connection
Ag <- rindex.function(0)
#> Warning: cannot open file 'C:/Users/Tom/Desktop/rindex/inst/extdata/refractiveindex.info-database-master/database/data': Permission denied
#> Error in file(file, "rt", encoding = fileEncoding): cannot open the connection

wavelengths <- seq(210,12300,, 1000) * 1e-9

plot(Ag_data$wavelength, Ag_data$n, log="x",  xlab = "wavelength (m) - log scale", ylab = "n")
#> Error in plot(Ag_data$wavelength, Ag_data$n, log = "x", xlab = "wavelength (m) - log scale",     ylab = "n"): object 'Ag_data' not found
lines(wavelengths, Re(Ag(wavelengths)), col = 2, lwd = 2)
#> Error in Ag(wavelengths): could not find function "Ag"
